channel.title: bash on DevOps journey
channel.description: Recent content in bash on DevOps journey

item.title: Virtual Machine Crashed
item.description: Virtual machine out of control Does not turn off! On a typical day in a DevOps it is very likely that it will have to create or manage virtual machines, sometimes very important because production processes are running on them. Very often, it happens that maintenance, you have to restart or shut down these machines to move them to site or host. One of the most used virtual machine managers is ESxi from vmware.
